alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 6:17PM EST until January 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. For the Cumberland River...including Williamsburg...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until Tuesday Evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting, but will continue to run high through Tuesday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
